properties.name: isSilent
properties.description: If true, it doesn't redraw children

examples.code: // add node with redrawing var firstAddedIds = tree.add({text:'FE development team1'}, parentId); console.log(firstAddedIds); // ["tui-tree-node-10"] // add node without redrawing var secondAddedIds = tree.add([ {text: 'FE development team2'}, {text: 'FE development team3'} ], parentId, true); console.log(secondAddedIds); // ["tui-tree-node-11", "tui-tree-node-12"]
tree.on('afterDraw', function(evt) { if (tree.isMovingNode) { console.log('isMovingNode'); } console.log('afterDraw: ' + evt.nodeId); });
tree.on('beforeAjaxRequest', function(evt) { console.log('before ' + evt.command + ' request!'); return false; // It cancels request // return true; // It fires request });

params.name: value
params.description: Return value of creating input element

params.name: cause
params.description: Return 'blur' or 'enter' according cause of the event

examples.code: tree .enableFeature('Editable') .on('beforeCreateChildNode', function(evt) { console.log(evt.value); console.log(evt.nodeId); console.log(evt.cause); return false; // It cancels // return true; // It execute next });
tree.on('beforeDraw', function(evt) { if (tree.isMovingNode) { console.log('isMovingNode'); } console.log('beforeDraw: ' + evt.nodeId); });

params.name: value
params.description: Return value of creating input element

params.name: cause
params.description: Return 'blur' or 'enter' according cause of the event

examples.code: tree .enableFeature('Editable') .on('beforeEditNode', function(evt) { console.log(evt.value); console.log(evt.nodeId); console.log(evt.cause); return false; // It cancels // return true; // It execute next });

tree.on('beforeMove', function(evt) { console.log('dragging node: ' + evt.nodeId); console.log('new parent node: ' + evt.newParentId); console.log('original parent node: ' + tree.getParentId(evt.nodeId)); return false; // Cancel "move" event // return true; // Fire "move" event });
tree.on('beforeOpenContextMenu', function(evt) { console.log('nodeId: ' + evt.nodeId); });

tree .enableFeature('Selectable') .on('beforeSelect', function(evt) { console.log('selected node: ' + evt.nodeId); console.log('previous selected node: ' + evt.prevNodeId); console.log('target element: ' + evt.target); return false; // It cancels "select" // return true; // It fires "select" });
tree.changeContextMenu([ {title: 'menu1'}, {title: 'menu2', disable: true}, {title: 'menu3', menu: [ {title: 'submenu1', disable: true}, {title: 'submenu2'} ]} ]);
tree.on('check', function(evt) { console.log('checked: ' + evt.nodeId); });
var nodeId = 'tui-tree-node-3'; tree.check(nodeId);
tree.on('clickToggleBtn', function(evt) { console.log(evt.target); });

params.name: recursive
params.description: If true, it close all child node (default: false)

examples.code: tree.close(nodeId, true);

items.name: contains(containerNodeId, containedNodeId)
items.description: Whether a node is a ancestor of another node.

params.name: containerNodeId
params.description: Id of a node that may contain the other node

params.name: containedNodeId
params.description: Id of a node that may be contained by the other node

returns.description: Whether a node contains another node

params.name: parentId
params.description: Parent node id to create new node

examples.code: tree.createChildNode('tui-tree-node-1');
tree .enableFeature('Selectable') .on('deselect', function(evt) { console.log('deselected node: ' + evt.nodeId); });
tree.deselect('tui-tree-node-3');
tree .disableFeature('Selectable') .disableFeature('Draggable') .disableFeature('Editable') .disableFeature('Checkbox') .disableFeature('ContextMenu') .disableFeature('Ajax');

items.name: each(iteratee, parentId, context)
items.description: Traverse this tree iterating over all descendants of a node.

examples.code: tree.each(function(node, nodeId) { console.log(node.getId() === nodeId); // true }, parentId);

items.name: eachAll(iteratee, context)
items.description: Traverse this tree iterating over all nodes.

examples.code: tree.eachAll(function(node, nodeId) { console.log(node.getId() === nodeId); // true });
tree.editNode('tui-tree-node-1');

tree .enableFeature('Selectable', { selectedClassName: 'tui-tree-selected' }) .enableFeature('Editable', { enableClassName: tree.classNames.textClass, dataKey: 'text', defaultValue: 'new node', inputClassName: 'myInput' }) .enableFeature('Draggable', { useHelper: true, helperPos: {x: 5, y: 2}, rejectedTagNames: ['UL', 'INPUT', 'BUTTON'], rejectedClassNames: ['notDraggable', 'notDraggable-2'], autoOpenDelay: 1500, isSortable: true, hoverClassName: 'tui-tree-hover' lineClassName: 'tui-tree-line', lineBoundary: { top: 10, bottom: 10 } }) .enableFeature('Checkbox', { checkboxClassName: 'tui-tree-checkbox' }) .enableFeature('ContextMenu', { menuData: [ {title: 'menu1', command: 'copy'}, {title: 'menu2', command: 'paste'}, {separator: true}, { title: 'menu3', menu: [ {title: 'submenu1'}, {title: 'submenu2'} ] } } }) .enableFeature('Ajax', { command: { read: { url: 'api/read', dataType: 'json', type: 'get' }, create: { url: 'api/create', dataType: 'json', type: 'post' }, update: { url: 'api/update', dataType: 'json', type: 'post', data: { paramA: 'a', paramB: 'b' } }, remove: { url: 'api/remove', dataType: 'json', type: 'post', data: function(params) { return { paramA: params.a, paramB: params.b }; } }, removeAllChildren: { url: function(params) { return 'api/remove_all/' + params.nodeId, }, dataType: 'json', type: 'post' }, move: { url: 'api/move', dataType: 'json', type: 'post' } }, parseData: function(type, response) { if (type === 'read' && response.code === '200') { return response; } else { return false; } } });
tree.on('errorAjaxResponse', function(evt) { console.log(evt.command + ' response is error!'); });
tree.on('failAjaxResponse', function(evt) { console.log(evt.command + ' response is fail!'); });

items.name: finishEditing()
items.description: Exit edit though remove input tag

examples.code: tree.finishEditing();

// // node1(v) // node2(v) // node3(v) // node4 // node5(v) // node6 // node7(v) // node8(v) // node9 var allBottomCheckedList = tree.getBottomCheckedList(); // ['node2', 'node3', 'node5', 'node8'] var descendantsBottomCheckedList = tree.getBottomCheekedList('node6'); // ['node8']

// // node1(v) // node2(v) // node3(v) // node4 // node5(v) // node6 // node7(v) // node8(v) // node9 var allCheckedList = tree.getCheckedList(); // ['node1', 'node2', 'node3' ,....] var descendantsCheckedList = tree.getCheekedList('node6'); // ['node7', 'node8']

returns.description: padding left of tree node division

items.name: getLastDepth()
items.description: Return the last depth of tree

examples.code: tree.getNodeIdFromElement(elementInNode); // 'tui-tree-node-3'
tree.getNodeIdPrefix(); // 'tui-tree-node-'

items.name: getNodeIndex(nodeId)
items.description: Get index number of selected node

examples.code: tree.getState(nodeId); // 'opened', 'closed', // undefined if the node is nonexistent

// // node1(v) // node2(v) // node3(v) // node4 // node5(v) // node6 // node7(v) // node8(v) // node9 var allTopCheckedList = tree.getTopCheckedList(); // ['node1', 'node5', 'node7'] var descendantsTopCheckedList = tree.getTopCheekedList('node6'); // ['node7']
var nodeId = 'tui-tree-node-3'; tree.check(nodeId); console.log(tree.isChecked(nodeId)); // true
var nodeId = 'tui-tree-node-3'; tree.check(nodeId); console.log(tree.isIndeterminate(nodeId)); // false

returns.description: True if the node is leaf.

items.name: isUnchecked(nodeId)
items.description: Whether the node is unchecked or not

examples.code: var nodeId = 'tui-tree-node-3'; tree.uncheck(nodeId); console.log(tree.isUnchecked(nodeId)); // true

params.name: originalParentId
params.description: Original parent node id of moved node

params.name: newParentId
params.description: New parent node id of moved node

examples.code: tree.on('move', function(evt) { var nodeId = evt.nodeId; var originalParentId = evt.originalParentId; var newParentId = evt.newParentId; var index = evt.index; console.log(nodeId, originalParentId, newParentId, index); });

items.name: move(nodeId, newParentId, index, options)
items.description: Move a node to new parent

properties.name: isSilent
properties.description: If true, it doesn't trigger the 'update' event

examples.code: tree.move(myNodeId, newParentId); // mode node with redrawing tree.move(myNodeId, newParentId, true); // move node without redrawing

items.name: new Tree(container, options)
items.description: Create tree model and inject data to model

params.name: container
params.description: Tree container element or id string value

properties.name: data
properties.description: A data to be used on tree

properties.name: nodeIdPrefix
properties.description: A default prefix of a node

properties.name: nodeDefaultState
properties.description: A default state of a node

properties.name: template
properties.description: A markup set to make element

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description: Let us know the hostname. If you don't want to send the hostname, please set to false.

examples.code: // * node, commonjs // * Get Tree module from `node_modules/tui-tree` var Tree = require('tui-tree'); var instance = new Tree(...); // * distribution file, script // * there is `tui.Tree` as a global variable var Tree = tui.Tree; var instance = new Tree(...);

// Default options: // { // data: [], // nodeIdPrefix: 'tui-tree-node-', // nodeDefaultState: 'closed', // stateLabels: { // opened: '-', // closed: '+' // }, // template: { // internalNode: // '<div class="tui-tree-content-wrapper">' + // '<button type="button" class="tui-tree-toggle-btn tui-js-tree-toggle-btn">' + // '<span class="tui-ico-tree"></span>' + // '{{stateLabel}}' + // '</button>' + // '<span class="tui-tree-text tui-js-tree-text">' + // '<span class="tui-tree-ico tui-ico-folder"></span>' + // '{{text}}' + // '</span>' + // '</div>' + // '<ul class="tui-tree-subtree tui-js-tree-subtree">' + // '{{children}}' + // '</ul>', // leafNode: // '<div class="tui-tree-content-wrapper">' + // '<span class="tui-tree-text tui-js-tree-text">' + // '<span class="tui-tree-ico tui-ico-file"></span>' + // '{{text}}' + // '</span>' + // '</div>' // } // } var container = document.getElementById('tree'); var data = [ {text: 'rootA', children: [ {text: 'root-1A'}, {text: 'root-1B'}, {text: 'root-1C'}, {text: 'root-1D'}, {text: 'root-2A', children: [ {text: 'sub_1A', children:[ {text: 'sub_sub_1A'} ]}, {text: 'sub_2A'} ]}, {text: 'root-2B'}, {text: 'root-2C'}, {text: 'root-2D'}, {text: 'root-3A', children: [ {text: 'sub3_a'}, {text: 'sub3_b'} ]}, {text: 'root-3B'}, {text: 'root-3C'}, {text: 'root-3D'} ]}, {text: 'rootB', children: [ {text: 'B_sub1'}, {text: 'B_sub2'}, {text: 'b'} ]} ]; var tree = new Tree(container, { data: data, nodeDefaultState: 'opened', // ========= Option: Override template renderer =========== template: { // template for Mustache engine internalNode: '<div class="tui-tree-content-wrapper">' + '<button type="button" class="tui-tree-toggle-btn tui-js-tree-toggle-btn">' + '<span class="tui-ico-tree"></span>' + '{{stateLabel}}' + '</button>' + '<span class="tui-tree-text tui-js-tree-text">' + '<span class="tui-tree-ico tui-ico-folder"></span>' + '{{text}}' + '</span>' + '</div>' + '<ul class="tui-tree-subtree tui-js-tree-subtree">' + '{{{children}}}' + '</ul>', leafNode: '<div class="tui-tree-content-wrapper">' + '<span class="tui-tree-text tui-js-tree-text">' + '<span class="tui-tree-ico tui-ico-file"></span>' + '{{text}}' + '</span>' + '</div>' }, renderTemplate: function(tmpl, props) { // Mustache template engine return Mustache.render(tmpl, props); } });

params.name: recursive
params.description: If true, it open all parent (default: false)

examples.code: tree.open(nodeId ,true);

properties.name: isSilent
properties.description: If true, it doesn't redraw children

examples.code: tree.remove(myNodeId); // remove node with redrawing tree.remove(myNodeId, true); // remove node without redrawing

properties.name: isSilent
properties.description: If true, it doesn't redraw the node

examples.code: tree.removeAllChildren(nodeId); // Redraws the node tree.removeAllChildren(nodId, true); // Doesn't redraw the node

properties.name: isSilent
properties.description: If true, it doesn't trigger the 'update' event

examples.code: tree.setNodeData(nodeId, 'foo'); // auto refresh tree.setNodeData(nodeId, 'foo', true); // not refresh

properties.name: nodeId
properties.description: Parent node id to reset all child data

examples.code: tree.resetAllData([ {text: 'hello', children: [ {text: 'foo'}, {text: 'bar'} ]}, {text: 'world'} ]); tree.resetAllData([ {text: 'hello world'} ], { nodeId: 'tui-tree-node-5', useAjax: true });

items.name: search(predicate, context)
items.description: Search node ids by passing the predicate check or matching data

examples.code: // search from predicate var leafNodeIds = tree.search(function(node, nodeId) { return node.isLeaf(); }); console.log(leafNodeIds); // ['tui-tree-node-3', 'tui-tree-node-5'] // search from data var specialNodeIds = tree.search({ isSpecial: true, foo: 'bar' }); console.log(specialNodeIds); // ['tui-tree-node-5', 'tui-tree-node-10'] console.log(tree.getNodeData('tui-tree-node-5').isSpecial); // true console.log(tree.getNodeData('tui-tree-node-5').foo); // 'bar'

tree .enableFeature('Selectable') .on('select', function(evt) { console.log('selected node: ' + evt.nodeId); console.log('previous selected node: ' + evt.prevNodeId); console.log('target element: ' + evt.target); });

items.name: select(nodeId, target)
items.description: Select node if the feature-"Selectable" is enabled.

examples.code: tree.select('tui-tree-node-3');
tree.on('selectContextMenu', function(evt) { var cmd = treeEvent.cmd; // key of context menu's data var nodeId = treeEvent.nodeId; console.log(evt.cmd, evt.nodeId); });

items.name: setNodeData(nodeId, data, options)
items.description: Set data properties of a node

properties.name: isSilent
properties.description: If true, it doesn't trigger the 'update' event

params.name: isSilent
params.description: If true, it doesn't redraw tree

params.name: parentId
params.description: Id of a node to sort partially

examples.code: var comparator = function(nodeA, nodeB) { var aValue = nodeA.getData('text'), bValue = nodeB.getData('text'); if (!bValue || !bValue.localeCompare) { return 0; } return bValue.localeCompare(aValue); }; // Sort with redrawing tree tree.sort(comparator); // Sort, but not redraw tree tree.sort(comparator, true); // Sort partially tree.sort(comparator, false, parentId)

params.name: data
params.description: Return value of executed command callback

examples.code: tree.on('successAjaxResponse', function(evt) { console.log(evt.command + ' response is success!'); if (data) { console.log('data:' + evt.data); } });
var nodeId = 'tui-tree-node-3'; tree.toggleCheck(nodeId);
tree.on('uncheck', function(evt) { console.log('unchecked: ' + evt.nodeId); });
var nodeId = 'tui-tree-node-3'; tree.uncheck(nodeId);
